title: Aseel Breed
line1: Aseel roosters are known for their bold nature and upright stance.

title: Country Chicks
line1: These chicks thrive without antibiotics and grow in natural environments.

title: Hatchery
line1: Modern hatcheries mimic mother hens using automated systems.

title: Racing Homer
line1: These pigeons can return home from over 1000 km away without GPS.

title: Farm Buffalo
line1: Murrah buffaloes can yield up to 15 liters of milk per day.

title: Eggs
line1: Country eggs often have deep yellow yolks rich in nutrients.
